meta_description: Selby Gardens’ bayfront sanctuaries are focused on connecting people with air plants of the world, native nature, and our regional history.
hours_text:
Come Visit Us  
Downtown Sarasota Campus

  * [General Information](https://selby.org/dsc/visit-downtown-sarasota-campus/)
  * [Get The Most Out Of Your Visit](https://selby.org/dsc/visit-downtown-sarasota-campus/get-the-most-out-of-your-visit/)

# Visit the Downtown Sarasota Campus

**Hours**

**Open daily 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.***_  
_

_*Open Thanksgiving Day 10 a.m. – 3 p.m._

_*Open Christmas Eve 10 a.m. – 3 p.m._

*_Closed Christmas Day_

__

__

__

Tickets are available onsite via contactless purchasing using credit or debit cards. Tickets may also be purchased online for the Downtown Sarasota campus.

**Downtown Sarasota campus  
Admission**

Members | Free  
---|---  
Member guests | $12 ...
